title: If you feel that face masks don't protect you...
alt: World map with red dots all over it. USA is particularly covered in red dots. Title over the map in big letters reads 'THIS WEEK IN VIROLOGY #673 WAKE UP AND SMELL THE PANDEMIC'
caption: ‚Äò... then the next time you have surgery tell your surgical team not to wear face masks‚Äô - Vincent Racaniello, Professor of Immunology at Columbia University

footnotes.text: As I was making this (during the 2020 pandemic) some fucking muppet interrupted selling door-to-door with a mask that didn't cover her nose. üò°
